item.title: NATO Says It Scrambled Fighter Jets to Shoot Down Russian Drones Over Poland
item.description: The incursion was the first time alliance planes had engaged enemy targets in NATO airspace. Poland’s leader called it “a large-scale provocation.”

item.title: Republicans Race to Advance Stephen Miran, Trump’s Fed Pick, Despite White House Ties

item.title: New Yorkers Support Free Buses, but They Don’t Think It Should Happen
item.description: A polling experiment shows how a small change in wording can make a big difference.

item.title: Poland Has Invoked NATO’s Article 4. What Comes Next?

item.title: Facing Israeli Assault, Many in Gaza City Say Fleeing Again Is Worse
